strong.br: The link below shows live pictures of the Junior High Auditorium. Pictures are taken every hour.

a.title: EarthCam Live Pictures of the Junior High Auditorium

strong.style: font-family: arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(99, 36, 35); font-size: large;
strong.span: Congratulations to Benson Public Schools for being recognized for excellence by the Minnesota Department of Education!

p.span: The Minnesota Department of Education released the 2018 North Star Accountability report on all schools. Overall, Benson Schools showed growth and Benson High School was recognized in the top 5% in the state for excellence in its high four-year graduation rate for all students and was also one of two high schools in the state to be recognized for its high graduation rate for low-income students. Congratulations to our students, staff, and school for this accomplishment!

span.style: text-align: center; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-size: 20px; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(71, 9, 9);
